report.title: Explore records using standard filters blurred to 10km
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord, with standardised filtering parameters. OSGB grid refs blurred to 10km
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: blur
param.description: Grid square size to blur to. Note that the 2km option is included for compatibility with the mapping version of the report and will output 10km grid references unless already in DINTY format.

column.name: occurrence_id
column.template: {occurrence_id}

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(snf.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = w.title then trim(substring(snf.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else snf.survey_title end

column.name: entered_sref
column.notes: cases in sql - a1 = OSGB DINTY or larger, a2 = OSGB 1km or smaller, a3 = OSIE DINTY or larger, a4 = OSIE 1km or smaller. b1 = OSGB 1km or smaller to tetrad, b2 = OSIE 1km or smaller to tetrad
column.sql: case when length(substring(onf.output_sref from '^[A-Z]{2}([0-9]{2})?[A-Z]?$'))>0 then substring(onf.output_sref from 1 for case #blur# when 10 then 4 else 5 end) when length(substring(onf.output_sref from '^[A-Z]{2}([0-9]{2})*$'))>0 then substring(onf.output_sref from 1 for case #blur# when 1 then 4 else 3 end) || substring(substring(onf.output_sref from 3) from length(substring(onf.output_sref from 3))/2+1 for case #blur# when 1 then 2 else 1 end) when length(substring(onf.output_sref from '^[A-Z]([0-9]{2})?[A-Z]?$'))>0 then substring(onf.output_sref from 1 for case #blur# when 10 then 3 else 4 end) when length(substring(onf.output_sref from '^[A-Z]([0-9]{2})*$'))>0 then substring(onf.output_sref from 1 for case #blur# when 1 then 3 else 2 end) || substring(substring(onf.output_sref from 2) from length(substring(onf.output_sref from 2))/2+1 for case #blur# when 1 then 2 else 1 end) else 'n/a' end || case when #blur#=2 and length(substring(onf.output_sref from '^[A-Z]{2}([0-9]{4})'))>0 then chr(65 + (substring(onf.output_sref from 4 for 1)::integer / 2) * 5 + (substring(substring(onf.output_sref from 3) from length(substring(onf.output_sref from 3))/2+2 for 1)::integer / 2) + case when (substring(onf.output_sref from 4 for 1)::integer / 2) * 5 + (substring(substring(onf.output_sref from 3) from length(substring(onf.output_sref from 3))/2+2 for 1)::integer / 2) > 14 then 1 else 0 end) when #blur#=2 and length(substring(onf.output_sref from '^[A-Z]([0-9]{4})'))>0 then chr(65 + (substring(onf.output_sref from 3 for 1)::integer / 2) * 5 + (substring(substring(onf.output_sref from 2) from length(substring(onf.output_sref from 2))/2+2 for 1)::integer / 2) + case when (substring(onf.output_sref from 3 for 1)::integer / 2) * 5 + (substring(substring(onf.output_sref from 2) from length(substring(onf.output_sref from 2))/2+2 for 1)::integer / 2) > 14 then 1 else 0 end) else '' end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#user_id#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end

column.name: pass
column.sql:
CASE WHEN o.data_cleaner_result='t' THEN '
' WHEN not w.verification_checks_enabled THEN '
-
' END

column.name: fails
column.sql:
case when o.data_cleaner_result='f' then replace(replace(replace(replace(onf.data_cleaner_info, '[', '
') end

column.name: status_hint
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'Accepted' when 'R' then 'Not accepted' when 'T' then 'Test' when 'C' then case when record_substatus=3 then 'Plausible' when o.certainty='C' then 'Recorder considered this certain' when o.certainty='L' then 'Recorder considered this likely' when o.certainty='U' then 'Recorder considered this uncertain' else 'Not reviewed' end end || case o.record_substatus when 1 then ' as correct' when 2 then ' as considered correct' when 4 then ' as unable to verify' when 5 then ' as incorrect' else '' end || case o.query when 'A' then ', query raised and answered' when 'Q' then ', query raised' else '' end
